thread.title: DNC Statement on Recent Russia Reports: ‘This Is Already Bigger Than Watergate’
thread.title_full: DNC Statement on Recent Russia Reports: ‘This Is Already Bigger Than Watergate’

author: Lindsey Ellefson
title: DNC Statement on Recent Russia Reports: ‘This Is Already Bigger Than Watergate’
text:
DNC Statement on Recent Russia Reports: ‘This Is Already Bigger Than Watergate’ by Lindsey Ellefson | 11:20   
The DNC response to Mike Flynn ‘s ouster from Donald Trump ‘s administration over calls to Russian officials and Trump’s determination to make the “ real story ” about the leaks that lead to it is here and it’s what you’d expect. 
DNC senior advisor Zac Petkanas sent it out today and it says this: DNC statement on recent Russia reports: “This is already bigger than Watergate.” pic.twitter.com/uODU1jEGNZ 
— Max Tani (@maxwelltani) February 15, 2017 
While calling the issue “bigger than Watergate,” Petkanas called for a full investigation complete with a select committee. 
Thus far, the calls for an investigation haven’t been answered. 
[image: Shutterstock] 
Have a tip we should know? Follow Mediaite
